mapper.delete: DELETE FROM work WHERE courseId=#{courseId} and chapterId=#{chapterId}
mapper.update: UPDATE `work` SET `name`=#{name}, detail=#{detail}, startTime=#{startTime}, endTime=#{endTime}, courseId=#{courseId}, chapterId=#{chapterId} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `work` WHERE name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
